transcriptText:
Thierry went back to his native France to visit family over the Summer holidays and made time to swing Indian clubs.

Traveling with our Heroic Sport Indian clubs is so handy and easy, and you can train in some pretty awesome locations.

Leave a comment if you have been to some of the places!

Indian clubs used in this video

What can Indian clubs do for you?

Gently mobilizes the shoulders, elbows and wrists and improve range of motion

Strengthens the shoulder girdle and grip ( muscles and connective tissues) in its full range of motion

Consists of compound movements in multiple planes

Provides low impact cardiovascular exercise

Assists recovery from intense training

Improves the 3 pillars of physical literacy (body control , locomotion and object control)

It is fun and you forget you are training.

The rhythmic and repetitive patterns are highly meditative and calm the nervous system, like meditation.

Cross crawl exercises and other challenging moves improve learning capacity and stimulate neurogenesis, the creation of new brain cells.

❂ Heroic Sport| An ancient discipline

Our clubs are easily adjustable, which is a modern twist on the ancient traditional Indian clubs used to train Tamil and Persian warriors and wrestlers.

Indian clubs were used in Europe and USA for remedial gymnastics in the 18th and 19th century, by pioneers of physiotherapy.

❂ Ready to learn more?

All our educational material has been tested and structured since 2010, in a way that is easy for anyone to learn from home.

Best regards from Thierry & Ron

terry from hero export welcome to the channel in today's video i'm going to take you for a quick little trip around france where i just spent two weeks holiday visiting families and so on and of course i've been swinging my clubs so what i have for this holiday was our plate loadable paladin gamma and a set of palette vandals for the light days you can check out the video locations in the description below hope you enjoy the tour [Music] you

![Thumbnail (1920x1080)](https://i.ytimg.com/vi_webp/Xd9HwBTXBLQ/maxresdefault.webp)
# [Swinging Indian clubs in France](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xd9HwBTXBLQ)

**Visibility**: Public
**Uploaded by**: [Heroic Sport - Indian clubs workouts](http://www.youtube.com/@HeroicSport)
**Uploaded at**: 2021-09-16T23:43:31-07:00
**Published at**: 2021-09-16T23:43:31-07:00
**Length**: 02:25
**Views**: 423
**Likes**: 24
**Category**: Sports

## Description

```
Thierry went back to his native France to visit family over the Summer holidays and made time to swing Indian clubs.
Traveling with our Heroic Sport Indian clubs is so handy and easy, and you can train in some pretty awesome locations.
Leave a comment if you have been to some of the places!
---
Indian clubs used in this video
Pahlavande original ☛ https://heroicsport.com/product/pahlavandle-indian-clubs-handles/
Pahlavandle Gama ☛ https://heroicsport.com/product/gada-mace-plate-loadable-pahlavandle-gama/
See all our handcrafted Indian clubs ☛ https://heroicsport.com/product-category/buy-indian-clubs-for-sale/ 
⚜️ Promo code: gen9 ⚜️ 10% off Pahlavandle original when not on sale
---
Step by step tutorials & programs ☛ https://heroicsport.com/indian-clubs-online/
⚜️ Promo code: swing101 ⚜️ 20% off all programs when not on sale
---
⏰TIMESTAMPS⏰
0:00 Intro
0:29 Les Orres 1850
0:46 Ermitage de Galamus
1:02 Briançon
1:25 Ax les Thermes
1:45 La grotte du trou La Caune
2:01 Pont du Gard
---
What can Indian clubs do for you?
Watch this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ft-FL_6s_No

❂ Physical benefits
Gently mobilizes the shoulders, elbows and wrists and improve range of motion
Strengthens the shoulder girdle and grip ( muscles and connective tissues) in its full range of motion
Consists of compound movements in multiple planes
Provides low impact cardiovascular exercise
Assists recovery from intense training
Improves the 3 pillars of physical literacy (body control , locomotion and object control)

❂ Mental benefits
It is fun and you forget you are training.
The rhythmic and repetitive patterns are highly meditative and calm the nervous system, like meditation.
Cross crawl exercises and other challenging moves improve learning capacity and stimulate neurogenesis, the creation of new brain cells.

❂ Heroic Sport| An ancient discipline 
We have created the Pahlavandle ™ range to make it affordable for everyone to discover the benefits of swinging clubs.
Our clubs are easily adjustable, which is a modern twist on the ancient traditional Indian clubs used to train Tamil and Persian warriors and wrestlers. 
Indian clubs were used in Europe and USA for remedial gymnastics in the 18th and 19th century, by pioneers of physiotherapy.

❂ Ready to learn more?
We run instructor certifications (online and live), team building events and offer video downloads on our website at https://heroicsport.com/indian-clubs-online/ 
All our educational material has been tested and structured since 2010, in a way that is easy for anyone to learn from home.

Best regards from Thierry & Ron
```

## Transcript

terry from hero export welcome to the channel in today's video i'm going to take you for a quick little trip around france where i just spent two weeks holiday visiting families and so on and of course i've been swinging my clubs so what i have for this holiday was our plate loadable paladin gamma and a set of palette vandals for the light days you can check out the video locations in the description below hope you enjoy the tour [Music] you
